info.name: Talk Matterbridge
info.summary: This app brings the Matterbridge binary to your server to connect Nextcloud Talk with other chat services.
info.description:
This app brings the Matterbridge binary to your server to connect Nextcloud Talk with other chat services. This allows admins to easily install and keep updated the Matterbridge binaries through a familiar interface.
